attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our country is not proud and great as it once was. WE need an anthm that represents the pride and confidence of our people. We shoud have an anthem that brings tears to peoples eyes , and cultivate then national identity of the Brithish people therefore i propose we change it to Macho Man by the Village People

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
